site_name: SAP Cloud for Customer Server-Side Integration (SSI)
full_content:
# Supported Environments     **[ This article is work-in-progress ]**     ## E-Mail Servers SAP Cloud for Customer Server-Side Integration is compatible with the following E-Mail Servers:

E-Mail Server

Supports Synchronization

Supports Add-In

Microsoft Office 365 (with Exchange Online plan)

Yes

Yes

Microsoft Exchange 2013, 2016, or above

Yes

Yes

Microsoft Exchange 2010 SP02

Yes

No

Outlook.com

Yes

Yes

Gmail

Yes

Yes
  * * *   ## E-Mail Clients SAP Cloud for Customer Server-Side Integration is compatible with the following E-Mail Clients:

E-Mail Client

Supports Synchronization

Supports Add‑In

Microsoft Outlook 2010

Yes

No

Microsoft Outlook 2013, 2016, or above

Yes

Yes

Microsoft Outlook for iOS, Android, or Windows mobile

Yes

Yes

ANY desktop or mobile client that supports Microsoft Exchange and works with folders and categories

Yes

No

Google Chrome (for Gmail)

Yes

Yes
  !!! warning "Important" Add-In will work only if both the **E-Mail Server** and **E-Mail Client** are compatible. Thereby, make sure that your client and server both score "**Yes**"
text_content:
Supported Environments
[ This article is work-in-progress ]
E-Mail Servers
SAP Cloud for Customer Server-Side Integration is compatible with the following E-Mail Servers:
 
 
 
 
 E-Mail Server 
 
 
 Supports Synchronization 
 
 
 Supports Add-In 
 
 
 
 
 Microsoft Office 365 (with Exchange Online plan) 
 
 
 Yes 
 
 
 Yes 
 
 
 
 
 Microsoft Exchange 2013, 2016, or above 
 
 
 Yes 
 
 
 Yes 
 
 
 
 
 Microsoft Exchange 2010 SP02 
 
 
 Yes 
 
 
 No 
 
 
 
 
 
 Outlook.com 
 
 
 
 Yes 
 
 
 Yes 
 
 
 
 
 
 Gmail 
 
 
 
 Yes 
 
 
 Yes 
 
 
 
 
E-Mail Clients
SAP Cloud for Customer Server-Side Integration is compatible with the following E-Mail Clients:
 
 
 
 
 E-Mail Client 
 
 
 Supports Synchronization 
 
 
 Supports Add‑In 
 
 
 
 
 Microsoft Outlook 2010 
 
 
 Yes 
 
 
 No 
 
 
 
 
 Microsoft Outlook 2013, 2016, or above 
 
 
 Yes 
 
 
 Yes 
 
 
 
 
 Microsoft Outlook for iOS, Android, or Windows mobile 
 
 
 Yes 
 
 
 Yes 
 
 
 
 
 ANY desktop or mobile client that supports Microsoft Exchange and works with folders and categories 
 
 
 Yes 
 
 
 No 
 
 
 
 
 Google Chrome (for Gmail) 
 
 
 Yes 
 
 
 Yes 
 
 
 
 
!!! warning "Important"
 Add-In will work only if both the E-Mail Server and E-Mail Client are compatible. Thereby, make sure that your client and server both score "Yes"
